content.raw:
3.1.0 release is now being built so 3.0.x version won't be available in the repo anymore.

There are [instructions to still run 3.0.x versions](http://gazebosim.org/wiki/DRC/Install/3.0) but please, try to update your system to groovy as soon as possible since support for fuerte/rosbuild in the 3.0 branch will decease very soon. Take it as a transition time.

The plan is to get a new 3.0.1 with this change and some other bugfixes, probably quite soon.
content.html:
3.1.0 release is now being built so 3.0.x version won't be available in the repo anymore.

There are instructions to still run 3.0.x versions but please, try to update your system to groovy as soon as possible since support for fuerte/rosbuild in the 3.0 branch will decease very soon. Take it as a transition time.

The plan is to get a new 3.0.1 with this change and some other bugfixes, probably quite soon.
